dmca.title: [ADMINS] http://mannatechcancer.stutilityservices.co.uk
dmca.body:
t

---Original Message-----
From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
lec@mannatech.com
Sent: Friday, September 15, 2006 10:54 AM
To: Admins
Subject: [ADMINS] http://mannatechcancer.stutilityservices.co.uk

Peter Pathos

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 

Dallas TX 75207

admins@theplanet.com

 

RE:  http://mannatechcancer.stutilityservices.co.uk

 

Dear Mr. Pathos:

 

The Mannatech Legal, Ethics & Compliance Department was recently
notified of your website,
http://mannatechcancer.stutilityservices.co.uk.  As you may know,
Mannatech owns many valuable intellectual property rights, including
international patents, copyrights, and trademarks.  On your website, you
are using the trademarks "Mannatech" (TM) and "Ambrotose" (R) in a
manner that might be used to unfairly capitalize on the popularity of
the trademarks.  

 

We are unaware of any legitimate interest in or business purpose for
your use of Mannatech's trademark(s) in this manner.  Even the use of a
trademark (or common misspellings) in invisible text, alt text or meta
tags, which are invisible to the user, may be viewed as an improper and
unauthorized attempt to derive commercial value from Mannatech's
valuable trademark. 

 

If, on the other hand, you believe you have a legitimate business
interest in the use of the trademark, please reply to this email with a
brief explanation, so that we can consider your request and avoid any
further misunderstandings. 

 

If you placed the trademark on your site in error, please remove all
such references (including common misspellings) from your site and reply
to me within five (5) days so we may close this case. 

 

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation.

 

Sincerely,

Mannatech Legal, Ethics & Compliance

lec@mannatech.com
